meanings.sent1: In some cultures, people polygamize to have multiple spouses.
meanings.sent2: The king decided to polygamize and marry more than one queen.
meanings.sent3: The idea to polygamize and have a big family seemed overwhelming but exciting.
meanings.sent4: She wanted to polygamize her schedule, juggling multiple tasks at once.
meanings.sent5: The decision to polygamize his business ventures led to both success and challenges.

meanings.definition: To enter into a polygamous marriage.
meanings.sent1: The couple chose to polygamize and have a joint wedding ceremony with their partners.
meanings.sent2: Some individuals polygamize to form unconventional but loving family structures.
meanings.sent3: The idea to polygamize and have a shared household with multiple spouses was met with mixed reactions.
meanings.sent4: Their decision to polygamize their relationships brought them closer together in a unique way.
meanings.sent5: They planned to polygamize their lives, intertwining their futures in a harmonious union.
